term.title: Marcus–Coltrin path

item.text: A path trajectory over a potential-energy surface which corresponds to the outermost vibrational turning points for the molecular species involved. This path was suggested as a device for calculating the probability of quantum-mechanical tunnelling: the trajectory for the system is considered to follow this path.
